thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 3 nights in rome
thread.title_full: 3 nights in rome - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Linda19600
title: 3 nights in rome
text:
Lovely hotel near the colosseum. In fact I thought the view of the colosseum from the roof top terrace was photoshopped, but no you can see a great view from up there.
For its central position it was really quiet with some great reasonably priced good restaurants and bars . The hotel gave a great recommendation for the first night
Really smart foyer clean comfy rooms and the best thing was the staff. Friendly and helpful. Will definitely go back
